channel.title: 317 [Bronze Age] [Updated] 317 Great Server to start with
channel.description:
:D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D
:) I am releasing this source because it was not a good one to start off with yes it is the old runescape gameframe if you are looking for that
-CREDITS-
Original Owner of Bronze Age Ix Soulcist xI -96%- Me VivaPks -4%-
What i have done
I added no trading from the same ip.. yes so if your on the same ip you cant trade :P cleaned the source and the client I added no multi-logging.. I also fixed up a little bit of the donator not extreme but its good to start with :)
This is a very friendly server to start with if you are new,... it is pretty good [b][size=12pt]There is No Anti-Leech.. But once again don't leech, if you do give at least the full credit's[/size][/b]
[b][size=18pt]FOR PICTURES VISIT THIS[/size][/b]
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,460414.0.html
[b][size=14pt]I am realeasing this to the new coder's that need it to improve![/size][/b]
Like i said i have not done much.. I am not gonna host this because i dont want to leech.. Plus I HAVE NOT DONE TO MUCH BUT THIS IS GOOD IF NEW CODER'S DONT KNOW HOW TO DO IT!
Dont Leech this be creative noobs.
[b][size=24pt]Downloads....[/size][/b]
Source-- http://uppit.com/6ksl4fktns15/Bronze_Age_Server.rar
Client-- http://uppit.com/8nwnqjj502cw/Chechen-Mafia.rar
If you are gonna leech this please give credits...
[b][size=24pt]<3[/size][/b]
[u][size=18pt]Please Comment Below on what you think ;)[/size][/u]
... [b][size=24pt]BTW Stop saying "OMFG YOU BARELY DID ANYTHING"[/size][/b] [b][size=24pt]Like i said new coder's don't know things like No Same Ip Trading..[/size][/b]

item.title: 317 [Bronze Age] [Updated] 317 Great Server to start with
item.dc:creator: @vivapks vivapks
item.description:
@vivapks wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:1, topic:367548”]Lol?

You copied a few tutorials about same ip, released and gave yourself credits and posted here.

Simple fixes anybody could do by following a tutorial

I dont see permission from the original owner for you to post, therefor this is not your work

Pointless.[/quote]

Rofl i got permission from the Owner… Dipshit Secondly I did not follow any tutorial’s. This was easy to figure out… I had a plan on working on it for awhile but the client and server were messed up… Thirdly new coder’s don’t know how to do things like this even though you think their “easy.”
By the way you got owned faggot.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @vivapks vivapks
item.description:
@vivapks wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:12, topic:364958”][quote author=vivapks link=topic=461158.msg3373891#msg3373891 date=1287441968]

You had absolutely no reason at all to add “… DELTA FAIL’S LLOOLL”
Why did you post this anyway? All you fixed was 3½ things…

I said " Fixing IP Trading " “Fixed Multi Logging” “ITS A FRIENDLY NOOB SERVER” …Maybe next time you should read it carefully moron.
[/quote]
So what? You added “It’s a friendly noob server” (suppose to be a noob friendly server moron) and 3 things that you FIXED not what you think it is.

[quote author=vivapks link=topic=461158.msg3373891#msg3373891 date=1287441968]I added no trading from the same ip… yes so if your on the same ip you cant trade
cleaned the source and the client
I added no multi-logging…[/quote]
That’s three things that you fixed.[/quote]

HAH 23 Rep Your the one that should be talking… So… I fixed 3 things most of the new coders out there don’t know that… Moron… Seriously just jump of a cliff.

Read full topic

@vivapks wrote:

no, iron beats bronze :p

ONTOPIC:
I don’t see a point in editting this a little then release when you made a few small updates
just saying,
EDIT: edit it some more no point in really reposting

Well it is a noob friendly server… so i added No multi logging and no Ip trading , because new coder’s dont know that… So there was a point in posting it to help new coders thanks for the comment.

I am releasing this source because it was not a good one to start off with yes it is the old runescape gameframe if you are looking for that

-CREDITS-

Original Owner of Bronze Age Ix Soulcist xI -96%-
Me VivaPks -4%-

What i have done

I added no trading from the same ip… yes so if your on the same ip you cant trade
cleaned the source and the client
I added no multi-logging…
I also fixed up a little bit of the donator not extreme but its good to start with

This is a very friendly server to start with if you are new,… it is pretty good
[size=12pt]There is No Anti-Leech… But once again don’t leech, if you do give at least the full credit’s[/size]

Dont Leech this be creative noobs.
